text:
Long ago, after the fall of the Aditya,
the lineage of the Asuras, who were led by Varuna—

In the otherworldly realm of Devaloka, where the cycle of Samsara
is absolute, there were said to be three great powers governing
the 'Preservation', 'Destruction', and 'Creation' of the turning world.

And, the 'Transient' Jagannath was of
the lineage of Preservation, the faction of 'Vishnu'.

Appearing in the world under various names, he sided with
the 'preservation of the status quo', and stood before 'Destruction'.

To that end, in various forms, he struck down many wars
and many adversaries under the banner of Dharma— Righteousness.

And, in the midst of a certain legendary war, the Battle of Kurukshetra,
Jagannath stood by as nearly half of a world divided was wiped from existence.

Resigned to the belief that 'some people cannot be saved',
he employed tactics of deception and trickery against the Kaurava faction.

And, whatever could the result be?
A cycle of vengeance was ignited, claiming countless lives in its wake.

In choosing the best path, he ended up destroying what he cherished most.
He was well aware that he had moved past mere persuasion,
manipulating the hearts of the people.

The war against Duryodhana, 'The One Filled with Greed',
brought about a conclusion so gruesome, that its
echoes vibrated through every era that followed.

Jagannath asked himself. 'Was there really no other way'?
Was there really no other path that could have averted such a catastrophic tragedy?

Since that day, he ceased to plant his feet in a single camp.
Instead, he chose to exist perpetually between two opposing forces.

Following the example of his former sworn friend Arjuna, that he once deeply hurt,
he became 'ambidextrous', straddling the line between the light and the shadows.

Pulling strings from behind both clashing sides,
he sought to avoid the same decisive catastrophe as before.

But, even so. Jagannath has only two hands.
The past, the present, and the future, his reach still could not extend to all three—

Finale:
The Battered and Bruised "Bad Cops"

The final day of the Fighting Festival— Christmas Eve.
As the sun dipped below the horizon, the venue began to fill with the heat of the crowd.

name: Hotei
text:
Now then, it's finally time for the finale of this year's Fighting Festival—
The opening of the 'Deco-Float Contest'~!!

name: Hotei
text:
But, before we get into that~?
Let's do a quick recap of the winners from each program so far!

name: Hotei
text:
The winner of the first 'Float Clash' was— the Asakusa Group, 'Asokenkai'!
The float carrying Sanat Kumara-han remained until the very end.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Even in defeat, I was supported by my juniors.
For me, I feel it was an invaluable experience.

name: Gorozaemon
text:
I was on pins and needles thinking the role of General Manager would be forced on me.
Sanat wandering around was interesting, but I'd like to spared a second time.

name: Hotei
text:
And then, on the 'Christmas Creative Food Stall Contest',
the Kabukicho Group, 'Kichorabu', grabbed the judges' stomachs~!!

name: Hotei
text:
The Ikebukuro Group had a fierce comeback,
but it seemed Y'golonac-han's secret ingredient... was the game-changer?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hihihi! Uncle's own sinful meal (profit-ignoring version)
was loaded with ■■■■, so it was sure to be unbeatable!

name: Suzuka
text:
I'll let it slide since we're in the middle of a festival,
but if you sneak that into the shop's drinks...
You know what'll happen, don't you?

name: Baphomet
text:
Ufufu, that certainly became a wonderful memory.
To be so absorbed in it with the children...
Wouldn't you agree, Kirito-sama?

name: Kirito
text:
Yes, yes, it'll definitely become a memory I'll probably see in my dreams.
I meant it in the worst way possible, Baphomet-san.

name: Hotei
text:
The Shibamata Group, 'Teijashu', also showed us
some incredible moves in the 'Holy Night Dance Contest'!
Was their path to victory Barong-han's skill, passion, and— insane stamina!?

name: Barong
text:
Everyone out there was a top-tier dancer! If it were possible,
I would've kept on dancing until the sun comes rising!

name: Taishakuten
text:
For the sake of the Suidocho guys who helped us this far,
we're gonna show you guys our Shibamata spirit and guts until the end!!

name: Hotei
text:
And what's fresh in our memory is the highlight, the 'Tag Match'!
Including the teachers' chaos, it was a really fun event~!

name: Hotei
text:
The Ikebukuro Group— 'Color Gang', represented by Jagannath-han and Jinn-han,
snatched a brilliant victory right at the finish line!!

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, it was just as wild as the real-deal Fight Club!
In fact, you interested in joining us, Jinn-sensei?

name: Jinn
text:
—Hm!? But my main duty is as an educator...
Well, if Avarga-sensei is there, maybe I could consider too?

name: Color Gang
text:
Just join already, Jinn-sensei!
You were super cool, I wanted to see you fight again!

name: Jinn
text:
R-Really? Well, if you guys wanted to see me that much,
I suppose I have no choice but to consider it...!?

options.text: Even Jagan became a Santa so casually!?
Really feels like Christmas is in full swing~!

name: Hotei
text:
So, whether you'd believe it, every group has one win so far!
It looks like this Deco-Float Contest shall decide our overall champion.

name: Hotei
text:
Now then, it's about time we dive into the contest, no?
Let's meet our judges! First up— the master sculptor, Vapula-han!

name: Vapula
text:
Ehem, I have a thing or two to say about 3D modeling-pura!
My professional eyes will be as harsh as it's heartfelt, so you better prepare yourselves~?

name: Hotei
text:
And, same as Vapula-han, from 'Akihabara' Academy—
Akiha Gongen-han from the Traditional Crafts Department!

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
I'm a little worried if I'm even qualified to judge these pieces,
but these things feel much closer to my heart than usual. Nice to meet ya!

name: Hotei
text:
And, our Head Judge is none other than this person! Itzamna-han from 'House of Iguana',
who has contributed greatly to the world of Tokyo's arts~!!

name: Itzamna
text:
'Deco-Floats' are something I have never once heard of, let alone seen...
Fufu, I will be looking forward to experiencing this new form of art.

In a corner of the venue, [Player] and Jagannath—
The delinquent cop duo, watched the excitement.

name: Jagannath
text:
Right, we've finally made it this far.
Let's enjoy every second and go out with a bang!

options.text: Whoever enjoys it the most wins!

name: Hotei
text:
Alright, shall we light up the floats on standby all at once,
and unveil every group's decorations!?

name: Hotei
text:
Then, are you all ready? Let's countdown together!
3, 2, 1— Lights Up~!!

At that signal, lights instantly filled the
four massive floats that had only been dim outlines.

The spectators gasped at the sight of the huge
structures covered in colorful, blinking illuminations.

name: Itzamna
text:
Oho, now this is... All of them are unique and undeniably beautiful.
Instead of a Christmas tree, a Christmas Deco-Float is in place.

name: Itzamna
text:
The Kabukicho float— perfectly capturing the spirit of the night districts.
Gorgeous and brilliant, yet, possessing a transience,
much like the fleeting 'Dream of Kantan'.

邯鄲の夢 (Dream of Kantan): classic Japanese play, about someone becoming
an emperor for 50 years, but only to be revealed to be a 'fleeting' dream

The decoration, mimicking a champagne tower, used the smooth flickering and
shifting hues of the lights to simulate the flow of liquid cascading down.

Butterfly wings on the sides swayed in the wind,
a mirror ball at the top scattering particles of light. Purple, crimson, gold—
The mysteriously blinking colors were the night town itself.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Actually, did you know!? This was Uncle's idea!
You can learn about these kinds of projects at Suidocho too~!

name: Tsukuyomi
text:
Y'golonac always gives back what he learns to Kabukicho.
Truly a masterpiece, no flattery intended. What do you think, my Queen?

name: Ellie
text:
Yeah, sparkly things... I like them. Photoshoots with the Deco-Trucks
are trending right now, so why don't we get some photos later?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Y'golonac
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hihihi, praise me more, praise me~!!
Let's take a sparkly, viral commemorative photo together later with Uncle, [Player]!

options.text: The King and the Queen, amazingly suitable...!
It's like an amusement park parade...!

name: Vapula
text:
Now, this one from Shibamata is themed around business.
The sculpting on that central white elephant is quite fascinating-pura.

name: Vapula
text:
I can tell that you guys obsessed over every little detail.
Using 'negative space' to give it such a light, airy feel is truly impressive-pura!

Atop a mass of flashily flickering thunderclouds stood a magnificent white elephant.
Every time a bolt of lightning struck, its powerful form was illuminated.

Adorning the base were symbols of prosperity,
Maneki-neko cats, abacuses, gold coins, and Daruma dolls.
All serving as approachable accents to the grand design.

name: Nobuharu
text:
Our float is the crystallization of the shopping district's ideas!
It's a fusion of Taishakuten-senpai and the image of commerce.

name: Taishakuten
text:
It's a bit embarrassing, but honestly, it looks great.
I especially love the way it sparks with electricity!!

options.text: It's cool, and it's just like you, Taishakuten!
I like how it's flashy, yet still down-to-earth.
So this is how the world of a classic former yankee looks like~

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
Let's see, Asakusa'd be—
Haha, it's clearly 'Yankee and Hometown', isn't it?

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
I like how easy that is to understand.
A straight-up yankee bike seems pretty hot for me too!

A gigantic motorcycle with a seat protruding like a pompadour hairstyle—
Headlights motifed after the Kaminarimon lantern emitted a passionate beam of light.

Banners of motorcycle gangs and shop curtains from Nakamise Street
were arranged on the sides, condensing the pride of
yankees and the love of the locals into a single float.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Mmm, now that my affection for Asakusa has deepened,
this proud and majestic sight that shines even brighter in my eyes!

name: Jinn
text:
Man, even I can feel the love packed tightly inside this thing.
Thinking about how the team worked as one to build this makes me want to cry...!

name: Motosumi
text:
Right? We even had Takemaru help with the framework parts.
I want you to pay close attention to the craftsmanship there too!!

options.text: This is the world of active, full-throttle yankees!
Akiha is a mild yankee, after all.

name: Itzamna
text:
And finally... this lustrous and magnificent float from Ikebukuro.
Yet, it wears a very simple and gentle radiance.

name: Itzamna
text:
But, this modeling... It is strong and masculine,
yet it has a warmth that seems to embrace you loosely.

The float, pulsing with a slow luminescence reminiscent of fireflies,
had a distinctive form, just as Itzamna pointed out.

Goat-like horns, sharp wings, an arrow-like tail, and an appearance
just like the person who served as the motif. It was undoubtedly—

name: Baphomet
text:
...It couldn't be.
This is— me, is it not?

name: Jack Frost
text:
That's right. We motifed it after the
idol of you that exists within these brats.

name: Tvastar
text:
The calm way it glows is an application of bioluminescence~
In other words, luciferase is making luciferin glow!

Baphomet remained speechless, unable to move.
The children approached her timidly.

name: Color Gang
text:
...That's why we didn't want you to help, Baphomet.
We wanted to surprise you at the show. Sorry for keeping it hidden.

name: Color Gang
text:
Hehe, you couldn't tell yesterday since it was before we assembled it.
So... um. How is it? Do you like it...?

name: Baphomet
text:
...Is this, really how
I appear to you children?

name: Color Gang
text:
Eh? Ah, yeah. We wanted to express your kindness
and stuff, Baphomet. Was it... that bad after all...?

name: Baphomet
text:
—Children, would you mind
gathering here right now?

name: Color Gang's Members
text: —Eh?

As the group stood freezing at her resolute command,
Baphomet's face suddenly broke into a radiant, blooming smile.

name: Baphomet
text:
I will not be satisfied unless I hug each
and every one of you as hard as I can.

name: Baphomet
text:
Come, gather quickly!
I shall give you a hug that will make your breath stop, yes?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Fufufu, is that a confession of heretical faith?
Then [Player]-sama, you are welcomed into my large body as well.

text:
The audience was mesmerized by the four Deco-Floats lined up,
and cheers and shutter sounds flew everywhere.

While each group proudly boasted of their own decorations,
the mood of mutual praise became even greater.

name: Jagannath
text:
Strengthening bonds through the program.
That's the best part of this Fighting Festival.
Once we've made it this far, winning or losing's just a bonus.

name: Jagannath
text:
Well, creating an excuse to clash head-on is one thing.
Whether those brats really wanted to 'fight and win' is another story for them.

options.text: You mean to satisfy their fighting instinct?
Yankees really like people after all.
It's a clash because they acknowledge each other.

name: Vapula
text:
The modeling of Shibamata has soul and 'emo' in the details-pura!
But the craftsmanship shines in the framework of Asakusa too~

name: Itzamna
text:
Indeed. And the depth in Kabukicho's expression is also hard to discard.
The one who devised those decorations knows the essence of 'sorrow' well.

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
As expected of a yankee festival, everything's bold
and flashy, I just can't help but to love em' all!
But... personally, I'm strangely interested in Ikebukuro.

name: Vapula
text:
Hmm, what exactly is 'strangely'? I wanted to ask that,
but... there really is 'something' there-pura.

Prompted by Akiha Gongen's words,
the judges began a heated discussion with serious looks.

name: Hotei
text:
Um, hello~? Oh no, this looks like it'll take quite some time.
The results will be after the commercial break!

name: Hotei
text:
...Wait, we're in the middle of a live show!
Well, please wait a little longer for the results~!

Hotei informed the crowd that there would be a gap until the judging can conclude,
but the audience continued to stay fired up with victory predictions.

When [Player] looked sideways to see what to do until the results,
Jagannath, who was there just a moment ago, was gone.

Looking around hurriedly, they quickly found the delinquent cop messing around,
and having fun with the delinquent students a short distance away.

options.text: And they lived happily ever after!

text:
As [Player] watched that heartwarming scene,
someone stepped up beside them quite naturally.

name: Toji
text:
—So this festival has somehow reached its final day.
The decorations on the floats are magnificent, and a winter festival isn't half bad.

options.text: Toji, did you come to play!?

name: Toji
text:
...Today is my day off, [Player]. At the very least, I didn't come here to say
anything tactless as a member of the Police Academy.

name: Toji
text:
...I probably just wanted to see the
conclusion of this festival that you protected.

options.text: Wouldn't you say you had a hand too, Toji?

text:
Receiving [Player]'s lighthearted words,
Toji looked down slightly.

When a silence of unknown reason grew,
the lively voices of the children a short distance away reached them.

name: Color Gang
text:
Hey, our float isn't losing to the other groups, is it?
I'm already satisfied that Baphomet was happy, though!

name: Color Gang
text:
Right. We still have that special surprise...
Heheh, honestly, I'm more interested in that than the competition.

name: Color Gang
text:
I wonder what face Jagannath will make when
he sees that float? Maybe... he'll cry a little!?

name: Toji
text:
...?
Just what are they talking about?

options.text: They're talking about their gratitude to Jagannath.

name: Toji
text:
—I see. Another Deco-Float to use for
the final procession. 'For Jagannath's sake'...

Toji fixed his eyes on the excited children, then stared at
the distant figure of his colleague, and— Finally gazed downwards.

Closing his eyes for a few seconds to endure some kind of pain,
he looked back at [Player] with determination in his eyes.

name: Toji
text:
This... I'm not sure if I should be the one to tell you this.
In fact, I might be betraying Jagannath's trust in doing it.

name: Toji
text:
But, I'm taking my own responsibility in telling you anyways. That guy—
He's already submitted his resignation from the Kiou Police Academy.

name: Toji
text:
It was probably to protect this festival—
No, to avoid a decisive clash from happening.

name: Toji
text:
For some reason, the headquarters decided on a forceful intervention,
and he tried to hold it back in exchange for his resignation.

name: Toji
text:
...I too had come to want to protect this festival.
But I couldn't stop the headquarters. ...I'm sorry.

Saying so, he sent his eyes to Jagannath again.
The children he called brats were showing bright smiles,
even while being half-bothered by him.

note: for some reason I can't stop thinking about the 'who shot Hannibal' meme

options.text: Why would the police do such a thing?
Why would Chief Daikoku do such a thing?

name: Toji
text:
...Indeed.
I thought the same thing.

name: Toji
text:
As far as I know, the usual Chief Daikoku is not
someone who gets his hands dirty like this.

name: Toji
text:
He avoids adding his own hand until the very end,
choosing to extract the maximum benefit from the situation.

name: Toji
text:
For Chief Daikoku, I thought this method was...
A bit too 'destructive', you could say.

name: Toji
text:
Yes, lately I sometimes have the illusion that Chief Daikoku is possessed
by someone else, or that another person's shadow is haunting him.

options.text: Indeed, he seems like someone who'd do things more cleverly.
Toji, aren't you thinking a bit too much?

name: Toji
text:
...It's better than a question with no answer.
Right now, it's about Jagannath.

name: Toji
text:
Whether as a police officer, or as one of the delinquents,
I think that was the limit of what he could do for both of those sides.

name: Toji
text:
One foot in the light, the other in the shadows.
To me, that's much more difficult than simply choosing only one path,
yet that's what that guy's been up to all this time.

name: Toji
text:
He crosses the border himself, just so he can see things
from the same level as those on the fringes.
He's spent his life standing on a edge, maintaining that impossible balance.

A show of respect for a colleague, for a one and only rival.
After squinting like he was blinded by a brilliant light, Toji's expression suddenly clouded.

name: Toji
text:
...But, that's the problem. If he loses his position in the police,
he will no longer be able to stand upright. He'll crumble away himself.

name: Toji
text:
Just like me, despite being born an ogre,
placed myself on the side of the Public Security Police anyway—

options.text: So my buddy's doing whatever he wants!?

name: Toji
text:
I can... finally understand why he
wanted to take you as his partner.

name: Toji
text:
After all, he was shunned by both sides.
There's no way he didn't wish for at least one person to put all his trust on.

Another short silence.
Toji said in a dry voice.

name: Toji
text:
We probably shouldn't tell the children until the festival's over—
No, maybe better if we never tell them at all.

name: Toji
text:
They would be hurt if they knew he resigned from the police for them.
Of course, Jagannath doesn't intend to tell them either.

name: Toji
text:
...Sorry, but I'm making my leave. I'm not exactly like him.
I don't think I'll be able to hide my emotions in front of him.

As Toji left and the delinquent students moved away from Jagannath,
[Player] quietly walked up to their senior officer.

Noticing their figure, the delinquent cop—
The 'former' delinquent cop, laughed as if nothing had changed.

name: Jagannath
text:
Hey, what's up? That's a sudden sour face.
Don't tell me the cold's got you beaten?

Jagannath tried to make a light remark,
but his expression slowly stiffened.

name: Jagannath
text:
...I see, Toji blabbed, didn't he? That bastard.
Well, I did tell him to 'not tell the brats'.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you're asking if it's okay, then I've judged it to be 'okay'.
I have a policy of not doing things I'm not completely satisfied with.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Besides, you've finally grasped the hand I reached out, you know?
There's no way in hell I'm letting go now.

options.text: Is there no other way to solve it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
The police are an inflexible organization.
That's why I've been forcing things through from the inside, but—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, there's naturally a limit to being unreasonable.
This was the final resort I had prepared in advance.

options.text: Why did you keep it a secret?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I intended to tell you eventually.
But only after 'the festival' was over.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Think about it.
The police are a shitty, inflexible organization.
It's not something a rookie like you could do anything about.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text: So— Me telling you at a time like this would've only made you feel miserable, right?

options.text: What do you plan to do from now on?

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, I'll figure something out!
Full-time fighter's an option, trying something new's also an option!

name: Jagannath
text:
I've always believed that life is full of surprises.
I'll just take another stance, and have a little fun looking for my next place to belong to.

options.text: What happened to becoming your right hand, your other half?
I intended to stand by your side, Jagan.
You told me to follow you...

text:
Jagannath, who had maintained a light tone to the end,
had the mask he was wearing peeled off the moment he heard those words.

His breath hitched, as if he'd taken a physical blow to a vital organ.
He lowered the corners of his mouth, which were always raised, and looked down.

name: Jagannath
text:
...I wanted you to learn by watching my back.
I wanted you standing right there beside me.
I meant that from the bottom of my heart.

name: Jagannath
text:
I thought you could become a good 'delinquent cop', or even more than that.
Just thinking about what you could become excited me.

name: Jagannath
text:
...So, at the very least,
I wanted you to stay in the police just like this—

name: Jagannath
text:
No, I'm not in a position to say that.
I'm sorry... for everything. I can't find any other words.

Just as he showed a vulnerable expression like a scolded boy,
Jagannath's device pinged in his chest pocket.

He pulled it out casually and stared at the screen.
After letting out a short breath— He laughed again, just as he always did.

name: Jagannath
text:
Sorry, just some business to take care of.
I'll be right back, so look after the scene until then, okay?

He turned and left without any explanation.
On the way, he stopped once and looked back over his shoulder.

name: Jagannath
text:
...I had fun, these few days I spent with you.
Let's go to a festival again, though next time, we'll likely have a 'different relationship'.

Like so, [Player] was left alone.
It was after a while that lively voices approached.

name: Jinn
text:
It really was a lively float, Baphomet-sensei.
Anyone who knows their efforts must've been moved.

name: Baphomet
text:
This is also thanks to you, Jinn-sensei.
You repaired not only the decorations, but even the wounds in those children's hearts.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
There's a refreshing breeze blowing through this year's Fighting Festival,
and that wind was undoubtedly blown in by the Ikebukuro Group.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Indeed. It's customary to deepen friendships at the very end, but this year
we united early in a mode to watch over those brats, didn't we?

name: Baphomet
text:
...I am glad I have decided to participate. Truly.
To be honest, participating in the 'Fighting Festival' was a gamble.

name: Baphomet
text:
If it were just a dangerous event, it could have had the opposite effect.
But, with the warm-hearted people gathered here...

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Clashing to deepen each other's tolerance— That is the Fighting Festival.
Because of your presence, we were able to return to our roots, Baphomet.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hihihi, it has the aspect of a once-a-year great release festival, but that's right!
Anyway, the contributors this time were definitely Jagan's group!

name: Jinn
text:
No mistake there. That's why I think the idea of 'this year's after-party should
involve them without factional boundaries' is the best.

name: Jinn
text:
So, [Player]!
You guys should also come to tonight's after-party—

The members who came to invite [Player]
and Jagannath finally noticed something was wrong.

name: Jinn
text:
...What's wrong? You look a bit under.
And, where did Jagannath disappear to?

name: Toji
text:
We probably shouldn't tell the children until the festival's over—
No, maybe better if we never tell them at all.

name: Toji
text:
They would be hurt if they knew he resigned from the police for them.
Of course, Jagannath doesn't intend to tell them either.

At [Player]'s somewhat hesitant reaction,
the bright expressions of the group suddenly tightened.

name: Baphomet
text:
...Something unavoidable has happened, has it not?
To Jagannath-sama. Likely regarding us, and the children.

name: Y'golonac
text:
—What was that? Is that true, [Player]!?
What happened? You aren't keeping secrets from Uncle!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
As comrades who spoke with our fists, the same could apply.
I could use my 'Sacred Artifact', but... I want to hear it from your mouth.

name: Jinn
text:
What happened, [Player]?
Speak your wish. I've told you that I, your teacher will be with you, didn't I?

name: Color Gang
text:
Y-You're lying...!!
Jagannath left the police for us—!?

name: Baphomet
text:
You guys...!
When did you get there!?

name: Color Gang
text:
Wait— Why did he 'leave here'?
When Jagannath moves alone, there's always a special reason...

name: Color Gang
text:
What does that mean?
Is there really nothing we can do...!?

options.text: Everyone who's free, listen to me!
I'll 'do' what his hands cannot reach!

text:
Hearing [Player]'s idea,
everyone showed surprise on their faces.

name: Baphomet
text:
I see... That is interesting.
May I have a hand in it as well, [Player]-sama?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Then Uncle will call his business
acquaintances and gather some sponsors!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Then I shall pull some strings with the participants.
If we go with that hand, we can't have enough, right?

name: Jinn
text:
I'll take the lead on connecting with the other teachers.
...What an interesting wish, [Player]!

name: Baphomet
text:
Then I shall take the lead on the outside.
I will go and speak with a familiar professor.

Meanwhile— At the exit of the venue,
Jagannath was confronting a large force of police officers alone.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, quite the army you've got there.
Every single one of you lined up and ready to go...
Isn't this all a bit much?

name: Jagannath
text:
Besides, for the big bad himself to come out
just to crack down on a little neighborhood festival?

name: Tajikarao
text:
(...Ugh, why did he come here!?
I sent word for him to leave the venue with the children immediately—!?)

In the center of the police formation— Daikoku,
who had his subordinates following him, stepped forward.

Coming close enough so that others couldn't hear,
Daikoku whispered to Jagannath.

name: Daikoku?
text:
To think I'd meet a 'Preservationist' here.
Perhaps, the 'Creationist' is also here?

name: Jagannath
text: ...What?

It was certainly Daikoku's voice. But for an instant,
it was as if someone else had inhabited him—

name: Daikoku
text:
What is it, Jagannath-kun?
Is there something strange on my face?

It must've been his imagination.
Daikoku immediately returned to his usual tone.

name: Daikoku
text:
This matter won't just end with one mere festival.
The Fighting Festival has long been viewed as dangerous within the police.

name: Daikoku
text:
Given these 'Transients' and their naturally hot-blooded temperaments,
a volatile explosion could occur at any moment, wouldn't you agree?

name: Daikoku
text:
And now, we have an anti-social festival acting as a sanctuary for juvenile delinquents,
'guiding them', which is even more ominous.

name: Jagannath
text:
...That's one way to put it.
I won't go out of my way to deny it.

name: Jagannath
text:
But really, just a little more.
I'm sure I asked you to wait until the festival was over.

name: Daikoku
text:
Kuku... Did you really think that piece of paper would move the situation?
That your single head could do anything against the massive power of the police?

name: Daikoku
text:
—Of course not.
You were well aware of that from the beginning.

name: Daikoku
text:
That is precisely why you chose that style of yours,
keeping one foot in the police, wasn't it?

In the freezing December— Daikoku, with the moonlight as sharp
as a blade behind him, looked down coldly at Jagannath.

name: Daikoku
text:
—Jagannath-kun.
You've done well as far as your hands could reach.

name: Daikoku
text:
Checking enemy organizations through your position in the police,
and checking the police organization through your opposite position.

name: Daikoku
text:
But, either way— It was only possible by
'using the power of the police'. Correct?

Raising his chin slightly, he showed a thin smile.
That smile, mixed with a sigh, shook the night air.

name: Daikoku
text:
Fufu... If you had only stayed in the organization,
you could have protected many more delinquent children in the future.

name: Daikoku
text:
Yet, you choose to give up that position yourself,
just to protect a 'handful of delinquents'.

name: Daikoku
text:
No matter how you look at it, this is incredibly shortsighted.
From this point onwards, how exactly do you plan on protecting them?

name: Jagannath
text:
...I'll figure out the future when I get there.
God, I'm sick of turning my back on the brats right in front of me.

An old pain creaked dully in his chest.
But, that pain was exactly what supported his back strongly.

name: Jagannath
text:
I came to this Tokyo carrying that kind of regret.
So, not saving the brats in front of me isn't exactly a option.

name: Jagannath
text:
I reject the premise that 'some people just can't be saved'.
I admit it's unrealistic, but that is my 'justice' to stand by!

The roar of his soul made the cold air vibrate violently.
As if trampling over that afterglow, Daikoku said flatly.

name: Daikoku
text:
And yet. As a result of your foolish choice,
you can't even protect those 'brats in front of you' anymore.

name: Daikoku?
text:
Or, will you try to stop us with your own strength?
That would be quite 'destructive'... Very, very desirable.

Responding to Daikoku's hand signal,
countless police officers took up battle positions all at once.

name: Daikoku
text:
—Tajikarao-kun, Oguchi Magami-kun.
Of course, you two will also suppress Jagannath-kun.

name: Tajikarao
text:
...Yes.
Understood, Chief Daikoku.

name: Oguchi Magami
text:
Ugh... I'm so sorry...
At least give me a heavy blow to the stomach!

name: Jagannath
text:
...Well, I'm out anyway.
Might as well go out with a bang, like the delinquent I was always meant to be.

name: Jagannath
text:
It's been a while, but I'm counting on you, my 'siblings'.
Do lend me your strength tonight.

Muttering so, Jagannath kissed both his gloves and took a stance.
Before him, the violence of numbers stood like a massive wall.

name: Daikoku
text:
...Consider this my final ultimatum.
Or, do you really think you can win?

name: Jagannath
text:
Who knows. But— I might just be able
to hold you back until the festival is over?

name: Jagannath
text:
Or rather...
I've got no choice but to do it!!!

At the entrance of the festival venue, Jagannath stood alone,
refusing to give even an inch as he held the line against the police forces.

name: Jagannath
text:
Come on, just keep em' coming!?
I can still go... I can go like this all night!!

name: Daikoku
text:
I wonder just how long will that bluff of yours last?
Second wave— Surround the target and suppress him immediately!

name: Jagannath
text:
Tch, they just keep coming...
This is getting hairy. Do I really have to 'use it'...?

Facing the approaching second wave, Jagannath begins
to channel his energy into the gauntlet on his right arm.

It is his 'Sacred Artifact'— an Astra said to be capable of piercing mountains,
splitting the earth, and rewriting the very maps of the world.
Feeling its overwhelming power—

name: Police Officers
text: —Hm!?

name: Jagannath
text:
...Dammit.
I can't bring myself to punch guys wearing 'those' faces...

name: Daikoku?
text:
It seems the 'Preservationist' lacks the necessary resolve?
In that case, you shall taste destruction right here!!

Unable to withstand the concentrated attacks from all directions,
the lone warrior Jagannath finally collapsed to his knees.

name: Tajikarao
text:
—Jagannath!!
I'd tell you to surrender... but I know you're not the type to listen.

name: Tajikarao
text:
Chief Daikoku, that's enough!
Jagannath's already covered in wounds!

name: Oguchi Magami
text:
We have a significant number of casualties on our side as well!
Continuing to fight a desperate Jagannath any further would be—

name: Daikoku
text:
Oh? You two seem to have quite a soft spot for him,
don't you, Tajikarao-kun, Oguchi Magami-kun?

name: Daikoku
text:
It seems you still require more education
on what the police truly represents— Hm?

Daikoku's gaze shifts as the man gasping for breath
slowly and painfully forces himself back onto his feet.

name: Jagannath
text:
...Not yet. Tajikarao... Magami.
The festival... It isn't over yet.

name: Jagannath
text:
Until this festival is finished— Until those brats can
look forward and walk their own paths, I won't stay down!!

name: Daikoku
text:
Hahaha, you still intend to stand, Jagannath-kun?
I suppose those days you spend 'playing around'
as an MMA fighter weren't for nothing.

name: Daikoku
text:
Very well. Then I shall personally crush you
until you can never get up again—!!

The mallet raised high gathered the moonlight,
swinging down in a silver arc. In that split second—

'Twirling' his deflected mallet with effortless grace,
Daikoku allowed a thin, cold smile to creep across his lips.

name: Jagannath
text:
—!!
You, what the hell are you doing here...!?

[Player]'s blade intercedes at the last possible moment.
Blue sparks fly as a clear metallic ring echoes through the air.

name: Daikoku
text:
Kuku, I see. So you decided to make an appearance, [Player]-kun.
But, do you truly understand the meaning of this situation?

name: Daikoku
text:
You may be Jagannath-kun's subordinate for now,
but I am the 'leader' who rules over everything here, no?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Daikoku
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmm, an act of insubordination made with full awareness.
Then, may I assume you are prepared for the consequences that follow?

options.text: I'm not his subordinate, I'm his buddy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Daikoku
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, you've certainly grown attached in just a few days.
I suppose playing cops and robbers was an entertaining little game for you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Daikoku
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You have good eyes.
But, that only makes this more of a waste.

text:
A heavy, tense silence dominates the area.
It is shattered by the voices of the children, bordering on screams.

name: Color Gang's Members
text:
Stop it———!!
Don't hurt Jagannath anymore!!

The children leap in front of a sword-drawn [Player],
throwing their small bodies into the line to shield
them and Jagannath from Daikoku's confrontation.

Baphomet and Kirito step out to join them,
their silent resolve to protect the children radiating from them.

name: Jagannath
text:
You guys... Why? The festival's still going on.
You worked so damn hard for today, so just don't throw it all away...!

name: Color Gang
text:
That's enough, Jagannath.
You've protected us more than enough already!

name: Jagannath
text:
...The hell it is!
Hey Kirito, Baphomet, why aren't you two stopping them!?

name: Kirito
text:
—I don't see any reason to stop them.
Though, I can't really speak for Baphomet-san.

name: Baphomet
text:
...I am sure I would have done so on the first day.
In fact, I was the one who forced silence upon these children.

name: Baphomet
text:
But in these past few days— Both these children and I have changed.
And it was you two who brought about that change, Jagannath-sama.

name: Color Gang
text:
I don't want you to quit the police for us! Jagannath...
Please, keep being someone who can help people like us...!

name: Jagannath
text:
...
You guys...

name: Daikoku
text:
Fufu, what a truly touching scene.
Such pure, innocent behavior... I'd hardly believe you're delinquents.

options.text: Then, could you wait just a little longer...?
The children are already looking forward to their future.

name: Daikoku
text:
—Hm? That's why I said it's touching, isn't it?
One could call this an almost ideal turn of events, wouldn't you say?

name: Daikoku
text:
These delinquents have declared their own reforms.
They will now surrender and be taken into our custody.
It proves Jagannath-kun's involvement actually had some meaning.

name: Daikoku
text:
Now, let us leave this festival together.
The time has come to pay for your crimes and move forward.

Jagannath stares at the backs of the boys he wanted to protect—
The boys who are now acting as his shield.

name: Jagannath
text:
You guys...
Is this really how you want things to end?

name: Color Gang
text:
...Of course we wanted to finish it.
But— Jagannath, you really are an idiot.

name: Color Gang
text:
Because to us, you're way more important
than some festival, Jagannath.

name: Color Gang
text:
Thank you for everything you did for us.
So— Really, it's alright now...

Jagannath tries to speak, but the words catch in his throat.
And— it is in that moment that a roar of defiance thunders through the air.

—Hell no!
This isn't okay in the slightest!

Every head turns toward the source of the voice.
A person, no, the 'group' that was there—

name: Taishakuten
text:
Sorry, but I'm seeing this through to the end with these brats.
Fighting strong, arrogant bastards is exactly what I live for!

name: Color Gang's Members
text:
—!
E-Everyone...!!

name: Jagannath
text:
...You idiots.
You all ditched the festival to come here?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hmph, lending a hand to Jagan
isn't usually Uncle's style, but—

name: Y'golonac
text:
The cops are Uncle's natural enemies, after all?
—Hey, [Player]!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Watch closely!
This is exactly what happens to a 'delinquent cop'!?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Jagan, you're the one who stopped me from resigning as General Manager,
only to go and throw the towel in secret? That doesn't exactly sit right with me.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Surely you didn't think I'd be
intimidated by mere authorities, did you?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Now, I'll show the underclassmen of Umamichi Academy
exactly what a General Manager should be!

name: Jinn
text:
Yo, officers.
Did my students get into some trouble with you?

name: Jinn
text:
I'm all willing to hear a proper explanation.
But, if you do plan to take force, then—

name: Jinn
text:
I'll just have to show my students that their
Genie of the Lamp is a man they can really count on!

name: Baphomet
text:
Won't you please wait? This is the gentleman
who has taken care of me and my dear lost lambs.

name: Baphomet
text:
...I see. How very unfortunate.
In that case—

name: Baphomet
text:
Would you mind, if I took a little peek
into the 'consciences' of you fine officers?

The members of each group step forward, forming a solid wall of people.
Daikoku watches the scene with amusement, his voice remaining cold.

name: Daikoku
text:
...The heads among you surely would know how much
coordination it took to allow this festival to even happen.

name: Daikoku
text:
Any festival would require police permission to operate, but this
'Fighting Festival' was already pushing the absolute limits.

name: Daikoku
text:
Then I could assume you all understand the
implications of acting against us in this manner?

name: Daikoku
text:
We could forcibly shut this down right now.
And of course, we may never grant a permit for any following years to come.

name: Suzuka
text:
—Ha!
Go ahead and try it!

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Aaah, sounds like a challenge!
Why worry about next year, when there's something this fun right in front of us?

name: Nobuharu
text:
I-I will stand my ground too!
A festival... isn't over until you're safely home!

name: Kirito
text:
...I hate getting involved with the cops,
but leaving things with a debt is annoying.

name: Kirito
text:
Let's call it even after this.
That alright with you, Jagannath-san?

name: Daikoku
text:
I see. So the festival organizers choose full-scale war
with the police just for the sake of some color gang.

Daikoku raises an eyebrow,
his gaze full of irony as he scans the Kabukicho group.

name: Daikoku
text:
I could understand the naive students from Asakusa or Shibamata,
but the seasoned veterans of Kabukicho are making such a 'green' choice?

name: Daikoku
text:
We've had ourselves many adult dealings together.
Dare I assume you have suddenly lost the ability to calculate profit and loss?

name: Gyobu
text:
...Oh dear, you're right. Jagan's recklessness must have spread...
It might have been contagious, even.

name: Gyobu
text:
—Is what I'd like to say, haha!
This is who we've always been.

name: Gyobu
text:
The most important thing to us is our 'pride'.
If we bend it here, we'll never be able to walk straight again.

name: Tetsuya
text:
I don't need complicated logic
to fight you guys. Just come at me.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Exactly! This is the Kabukicho Uncle loves!
The city that raised Jagan and [Player]'s hearts~?

name: Y'golonac
text:
There are many forms to 'honor', but you won't find a single
person in Kabukicho who'd abandon kids in trouble!!

name: Daikoku
text:
I see, I understand now.
I shall take it you are all prepared to be arrested, then.

options.text: (I can see another shadow behind him...)
(He's being way more aggressive than usual.)

name: Daikoku
text:
Now then, I assume the students share the same resolve?
Of course, this isn't something that ends with just a warning.

A gulp audibly resonated from the crowd.
A different kind of tension ripples through the crowd.

name: Motosumi
text:
...I have kids of my own,
but well, it can't be helped.

name: Motosumi
text:
It's not like I'm gonna die, and Takemaru's here...
Most importantly, I can't face the kids if I back down now.

name: Licho
text:
Aargh!! I'm in! Dammit! I'll show you the spirit
of a yankee who stands up for his friends!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
The people of Asakusa have always been like this.
That's why— I will protect both these brats and my own people.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
If it takes politics to do it, so be it.
If you intend to use your police authority, then I have some ideas of my own.

name: Jinn
text:
Haha, that's what I like to hear, Sanat Kumara.
I'm with you, I'll protect the futures of all the students here.

name: Jinn
text:
I'll use the teacher network or whatever else I have to.
We'll resist you now and in the aftermath, so get ready!

Kabukicho, Asakusa, Shibamata, and Ikebukuro.
Everyone takes a battle stance against the police.

name: Daikoku?
text:
A march toward reckless 'Destruction'.
How very, very desirable...!

options.text: Which of us isn't looking at the future?
You sound just like someone I know.

name: Daikoku
text:
...Hm. A good chance to wipe out anti-social forces, or even if we lose,
their power will be significantly weakened.

name: Daikoku
text:
Fufu... Either way, I won't be losing.
Then, let us begin the total war you so desire!!
—Please wait!!

The police officers about to engage
pause as they hear a familiar voice.

name: Ryota
text: —Toji...!!

name: Toji
text:
Please back down for now, Chief Daikoku.
A full-scale clash costs the police too much in terms of public image.

name: Daikoku
text:
Good grief... One interruption after another.
Toji-kun, you're off duty. Why are you here?

name: Tajikarao
text:
...I was the one who reported it to him.
I was also the one who contacted Jagannath.

name: Daikoku
text:
Oh. Reporting to Toji is one thing, but contacting a 'man who left the police'—
Well, that would be a leak of information.

name: Tajikarao
text:
—I simply couldn't stand by.
I'm prepared for whatever punishment is due.

name: Daikoku
text:
The tip-off is hardly anything by itself, but it was bound to happen.
But then— Are you also prepared for the consequences of your suggestion, Toji-kun?

name: Toji
text:
...Yes, of course.
However, this judgment was not made based on my personal feelings alone.

name: Toji
text:
Dealing with this many forces would be a major incident in police history.
And, if I may add—

After glancing at his battered colleague,
Toji fixes a firm gaze on his superior.

name: Toji
text:
It may be too late now,
but we need police officers like Jagannath.

name: Jagannath
text:
...Toji.
You...

name: Daikoku
text:
To think, you, the polar opposite of him, are saying that!
Kuku, how touching. I'm almost moved to tears.

Daikoku makes a theatrical gesture of being moved,
but his expression and tone instantly turn cold.

name: Daikoku
text:
But— Unfortunately, the police
cannot back down here.

name: Daikoku
text:
Jagannath-kun, Tajikarao-kun, Toji-kun.
Each of you have overestimated your own individuality.

name: Daikoku
text:
To an organization like the police, individuals are merely gears.
We are nothing but pawns, numbers, and replaceable parts.

name: Daikoku
text:
Listen well. An organization is a mysterious beast that moves
with its own will, caring nothing for individual feelings.

name: Daikoku
text:
Sometimes, someone must play the villain.
—Proceed, officers. Do your duty.
Battle Start

name: Color Gang's Members
text:
Ugh, it hurts...!
It hurts so much...!

Tactically, it was a victory.
Strategically— It was a defeat.

Though [Player]'s group secured local victories,
the overall tide of the battle remained clear and unchanging.

In systematic warfare, discipline is everything.
In this urban sprawl of Tokyo, the police reigned supreme.
The floats were thoroughly destroyed in the clash.

The Color Gang and the festival delinquents were captured and pinned down—
Until that moment.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...Alright, now's the time!
Cut the surrounding curtains, [Player]!!

name: The Crowd
text:
Is this this year's Christmas event?
Police vs Delinquents battle? Nice!!

name: The Crowd
text:
Those kids looked beat up... Aren't they completely out?
That was some really good performance, I actually felt kinda bad.

name: The Crowd
text:
They had bad reputations, but seeing
them worked this hard... Good job, guys?

name: Tajikarao
text:
W-What is this!?
S-Spectators... When did they gather!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Well, I hope you've enjoyed our main performance?
A show where the officers played the Black Santas themselves... Hihihi.

name: Y'golonac
text:
And so, we shall dissolve the organization that has hosted Asakusa's 'Transient'
Fighting Festival since the turn of the century— No, 'destroy'!

name: Y'golonac
text:
In its place, with the support of landowners from all across Tokyo, we are expanding!
The festival is reborn, bigger and better than ever before!!

name: Jinn
text:
Even the principals of the Santa School have given us their seal of approval!
From next year, we'll officially integrate into the Santa Departure Ceremony!!

name: Baphomet
text:
This announcement is currently being broadcast live to the entire city.
Our sponsors include, the Chuo Ward landowners, and—

name: Temujin
text:
I, Temujin, promise investment from Setagaya.
Consider this a favor from a fellow student, dear MMA fighter.

name: Jagannath
text: ...Temujin!

name: Hogen
text:
Hohoho. For this year, it seems the penance of
these youths is finally complete. A masterful performance.

name: Toji
text: ...Hogen-sensei!

Toji tightened his lips at his master's remark,
as Hogen maintained his airy, aloof demeanor,
even as he turned to look Daikoku with unfathomable depth.

name: Hogen
text:
―So, Chief Daikoku. Had you continued that clash under the public's watchful eye,
your future action would have been quite restricted, no?

name: Daikoku
text:
...Swordmaster Hogen.
Were you the one to orchestrate this entire performance?

name: Hogen
text:
I did nothing of the sort. The ones proposing this
value was none other... than the children of the festival.

name: Hogen
text:
Fufu, value is something to be found.
Naturally, one must consider not to overlook its future potential as well.

name: Hogen
text:
And then― What is valuable continue to attract new value.
With those eyes of yours, I suppose you can see it from a grander scheme of things?

name: Daikoku?
text:
...Very well.
However, 'here' is a condition of our own.

name: Daikoku?
text:
Shinjuku Police and Kiou Academy are to participate fully, and officially.
We are to be treated 'equally' with the Setagaya and Chuo landowners.

name: Daikoku
text:
...Would that be 'sufficient',
'Exception'?

name: Daikoku?
text:
The 'Destruction' of this era has been completed.
Now, we move toward the 'Destruction' of the era to come.

name: Daikoku?
text:
The five 'Exceptions'— Fire, Water, Wood, Aether, and Nether.
Unlike those who were sealed away for threatening to break the 'Game' itself...

name: Daikoku?
text:
For the three 'Exceptions', Infernal, Valiant, and World,
we hold a meaning that is the polar opposite within the 'Game' of this Tokyo.

name: Daikoku?
text:
The 'Great Black' is satisfied.
The rest is up to you, Ookuninushi...
main story bit sneaking itself into event stories nickels: 2

name: Daikoku
text:
...Is he finally gone?
Well then, time for my own conveniences—

Resting his hand on his chin, Daikoku's 'sharp' mind began to whirl.
Continuing along this path would undoubtedly yield significant profits—

However, there was another 'path', one he had previously
dismissed as too much of a gamble, but it promised an even greater harvest,
and it was already taking shape in the back of his mind.

At the end of his cold cost-benefit analysis―
Daikoku muttered a few words to himself, whispering to his own soul.

name: Daikoku
text:
...Right. Having Hogen-kun owe
me isn't exactly a bad deal at all.

name: Daikoku
text:
Well then― Unwilling as I am,
how does this sound for a deal?

name: Daikoku
text:
Just as an example― if our friend there were to withdraw
that arrogant resignation letter of his, I might be
willing to 'dance in the palm of your hand' for a while.

His gaze was fixed on a single individual. The man, suddenly the center of everyone's
attention, stood speechless for a long moment before finally forcing out a response.

name: Jagannath
text: What... did you just say?

name: Jagannath
text:
Individuals have no value in the police.
Didn't you just say that to us?

name: Daikoku
text:
I do stand by that. However,
Toji-kun's suggestion had some merit to it.

name: Daikoku
text:
In other words— When considering the overall balance of the organization,
there is some value in having a 'foreign object' like you mixed in. Furthermore—

Daikoku's gaze shifted, slithering toward [Player],
who still stood 'protecting' Jagannath.

name: Daikoku
text:
If we can manage to secure Jagannath-kun, the risk of losing a 'certain
singular individual' to another organization is greatly diminished―
That is my personal conclusion.

name: Daikoku
text:
—Well now.
Would you be up for the deal?

name: Daikoku
text:
Withdraw that foolish resignation, and we withdraw from this site.
It's an exceptionally generous offer, wouldn't you say?

name: Jagannath
text:
...I've got no reason to refuse.
Consider it withdrawn immediately.

With a thin smile, Daikoku strolled over to Jagannath's side,
placed a hand on his shoulder, and leaned in to whisper in his ear.

name: Daikoku
text:
Hoho, surely you've learned your lesson by now?
I trust you've realized that without the backing of the organization,
you're nothing but a man at his limit.

name: Daikoku
text:
Now that you've felt the terror of the law,
I expect you to keep dancing in the palm of my hand.
Though, perhaps with a bit more obedience from now on.

name: Hogen
text:
Hohoho, I take it we have a deal, then?
Well then, let us withdraw to the station.
This piercing cold is starting to get the better of me.

name: Daikoku
text:
Hmmm, the rest of you may enjoy your festival in peace.
Organizers, I look forward to maintaining our excellent relationship in the future.

name: Daikoku
text:
And to you delinquents— Perhaps that title no longer fits you?
Please do see to it, that you do what must be done when the time eventually comes.

name: Daikoku
text:
Alright, fallback!
Everyone, return to your designated posts immediately!

name: Police Officers
text: <p2 style="font-size: 135%">―Roger!

As the police vanished from sight, the long-held
tension snapped, giving way to a sense of relief.

name: Y'golonac
text:
―Phew! That was terrifying! No matter how you
see it, that guy is the real evil here, isn't he!?

name: Jinn
text:
Yeah, that even sent chills down my spine.
That's hardly the behavior of a 'hero of justice'.

name: Baphomet
text:
And yet, I suppose that is what justice looks like to Daikoku-sama.
A 'distorted' justice, born from the belief that absolute power must be exercised...

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
So, Hogen simply exploited his obsession with power.
It seems the police's nothing but a massive iron cage,
filled with monsters and beasts prowling around...

name: Toji
text:
...Hogen-sensei. As I have expected,
I am still nowhere near catching up to you.

name: Color Gang
text:
...Um. I don't really get what happened,
but we're all safe now, right?

name: Color Gang
text:
Jagannath doesn't have to quit, right?
He gets to stay a delinquent cop forever, doesn't he!?

Surrounded by the children, Jagannath's face broke into a weary,
lopsided grin, while being far battered than after any other match.

name: Jagannath
text:
Yeah, it's all thanks to you guys. You've grown up so fast.
Damn, I didn't expect I'd be indebted to you this big.

name: Color Gang's Members
text: Jagannath...

name: Jagannath
text:
—Hmm?
Wai— Woooooah!!?

Overcome with emotion, the children burst into running,
diving headfirst into him while laughing through their tears.

name: Color Gang's Members
text:
Jagannath—!!
We're so, so glad you're alright——!!

name: Jagannath
text:
—Hey! That hurts!
I'm a injured man here, so go easy on me!?

options.text: As if someone'd go easy on you—!?
(Take the opportunity to hug him tightly)

name: Jagannath
text:
—Ouch! Hey, you're really
something else yourself... Heheh!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
The beauty of youth— Or more fittingly, the eve of youth.
Jagannath has guided them to the threshold they've needed.

name: Jinn
text:
Dammit, you're gonna make me start bawling too!
If I could, I'd take every single one of them in as my own students right now!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Gah! Dammit, should Uncle jump in there too!?
Uncle's grown plenty attached to you brats, you know!?

name: Baphomet
text:
Oh? In that case, could I insist on joining in as well?
Now, let us join in together, Y'golonac-sama!

name: Jagannath
text: <p2 style="font-size: 135%">—What!!?

name: Kirito
text:
Has Baphomet-san's character changed completely? Or...
Haha, maybe she was just like this all along.

name: Kirito
text:
Anyway, we're supposed to be heading for the grand finale, right?
I don't think we're gonna get anywhere with every single guild huddled up in one spot?

name: Taishakuten
text:
Oh, that's right! We still haven't announced
the contest winners, or finished the procession!

name: Taishakuten
text:
—Hey, Jagannath.
Dare I assume you've still got enough gas to go?

Taking those cheerful words as a cue, every expectant eye turned
toward the battered, huddled-up 'active-duty delinquent cop'.

name: Jagannath
text:
...Heh, don't you go underestimating a pro MMA fighter?
If I can get to see these brats' big moment,
then that's no problem to worry about!

name: Jagannath
text:
Besides, the float procession's a pretty hot 'tradition' back in my homeland too.
—Then, let's have ourselves a party to the very end!!

name: Itzamna
text:
My apologies for taking so much of your time with the judging.
It was a truly difficult decision to reach, but we have finally come to a conclusion.

name: Itzamna
text:
First, I must say that every group was magnificent.
Your regional characteristics became your strength, and your work was
overflowing with love for the lands you call home.

name: Vapula
text:
Among them, Ikebukuro was quite the outlier-pura.
They were the only ones who didn't push a regional theme,
instead focusing entirely on something else.

name: Vapula
text:
The design quality was high, but there were parts that were quite unrefined.
And yet— There was 'something' about it that simply couldn't be ignored-pura.

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
I'm not sure if I can put it into words well...
But it felt like there was a certain sense of 'earnestness' riding on it.

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
The other three teams had a sense of stability. They have years of history
behind them, and they'll likely build something different together next year.

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
But... The Ikebukuro group felt so incredibly unstable.
It was like they were throwing everything they had into this once-in-a-lifetime chance.

name: Itzamna
text:
I believe I understand what you are trying to say.
It possessed a 'one-time' quality, a brilliance that belongs only to that fleeting moment.

name: Vapula
text:
In a normal art contest, we probably wouldn't have been able to choose them-pura.
But— Maybe for this festival, a different set of criteria is allowed?

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
Yeah, I've heard this is a festival that values human sentiments.
I wouldn't have complained regardless of who won, but I really want to push for them.

name: Itzamna
text:
And so, here is our conclusion— Fufu,
I suppose I've already said as much, but let me announce it officially.

name: Itzamna
text:
For the Fighting Festival's Deco-Float Decoration Contest...
The glorious winning team is— Ikebukuro's 'Color Gang'!

name: Itzamna
text:
And— With this result, I hereby declare that the
overall winner of this festival also Ikebukuro!!

A voice possessing both dignity and warmth echoed throughout the venue.
The reaction of joy welled up slowly before erupting into a roar.

name: Color Gang's Members
text:
...W-We did it!!
We— We actually pulled it off!!

name: Baphomet
text:
Children... You worked so, truly hard!
Oh dear, if I am not careful, I might start to cry myself.

name: Kirito
text:
Well, it's hard not to be moved, right?
To think this pack of stray dogs would actually make it this far.

name: Color Gang
text:
Thank you, Baphomet, Kirito.
Jack, Tvastar, Jinn-sensei too...

name: Jack Frost
text:
Congratulations. You're the ones who came up with the ideas
and the ones who put in the work. You should be proud of yourselves.

name: Tvastar
text:
Yea, yea. Everyone worked so hard.
I had a lot of fun building this with you all!

name: Jinn
text:
Ugh, Baphomet-sensei is holding it in, but I can't stop the tears!
I'm just so damn happy to see how much you've grown...!!

name: Color Gang
text:
...[Player].
And Jagannath, thank you so much.

options.text: Everyone's hard work and unity has led to this.
Hey, my other half, your name's up!

name: Jagannath
text:
...Heheh, this is why I can't quit being a delinquent cop.
Setting aside the fact that I almost had to quit, everything turned out great!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
It seems that it wasn't just the children who achieved significant growth.
Jagannath and [Player] have also changed quite a bit.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Indeed, you've all overcome so much, haven't ya?
Uncle is happy to see such wonderful smiles.

name: Y'golonac
text:
But... With a success story like this, their path
to the Police Academy is all but set, isn't it?
Did Uncle really do the right thing by helping them out!?

name: Jagannath
text:
I'm really proud of you, my lovable little brats.
Feels like I could brag about everything you've done to the whole world.

name: Jagannath
text:
And then, looks like I'm not the only one who feels that way, right?
The entire festival is celebrating your growth. Take a look around!

Prompted by his words, they looked around at the crowd.
The various faces of the Fighting Festival were all looking back with warm smiles.

Overwhelmed by the sight, one of the children choked back a sob
before crying out at the top of their lungs.

name: Color Gang
text:
Everyone at the Fighting Festival... Thank you for accepting us!
Thank you so much for watching over us!

Taking that as a signal,
the rest of the boys bowed deeply in unison.

name: Color Gang's Members
text: <p2 style="font-size: 135%">—Thank you very much!!</p2>

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh! Then, it's finally time for the festival's climax—
The 'Float Parade'!

name: Jagannath
text:
That's it for your activities for now.
Let's give it everything we've got and go wild out there!!

name: Color Gang's Members
text: <p2 style="font-size: 135%">Oohh——————!!!</p2>

Meanwhile— A single figure was walking toward the Fighting Festival venue,
their footsteps heavy with reluctance.

name: Krampus
text:
...Haaah. This is so depressing. This is the first time
I've ever felt this way about going to work.

name: Krampus
text:
My job is to punish bad children and encourage them to reform.
I usually take pride in it, but today...

name: Krampus
text:
According to Tomte, those kids are a 'grayish black'.
And then, Jack took a 'personal' interest in them—

name: Krampus
text:
Dammit, I shouldn't have listened to him.
But if I truly care about those children, I must proceed solemnly— Eh?

Stepping into the venue, Krampus let out a gasp of utter bewilderment.
And then, what he saw before his eyes—

name: Color Gang
text:
Qinglong, gramps, you alright?
You can take my shoulder and walk slowly.

name: Jinn
text:
Ehh, your back gave out!? Let me carry you then!
I probably pushed you too hard in the Tag Match yesterday...

name: Amanojaku
text:
No! This is because of your sloppy lifestyle!
I'm going to strictly calculate your calories every day from now on, teach!

name: Qinglong
text:
Ouch, ouch... No, not tonight's peach cake!
Anything but the Christmas peach cake I've been looking forward to!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hm? Are those brats picking up trash?
Uncle told them they could wait until after the parade.

name: Baphomet
text:
They said they wanted to give back to the festival that took care of them.
They simply could not sit still without doing something—
That is what they have told me.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Those kids... *sniff*. They're so precious.
Argh, Uncle can't just stand here either! I'll help out too!

name: Child
text:
Wahhh! Mommy!
Daddy! Where are you!?

name: Color Gang
text:
Are you lost? Don't worry, kid.
Your Big Brother's gonna help you find them!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Hmm, perhaps we should try calling out from the sky?
Let us take flight immediately, lost child and former delinquent!!

name: Both
text: Heh— Waahhhhhhhhhh!?

name: Krampus
text:
Uh... huh.
Just who in the world... called these 'bad children'?

Krampus could only mutter in disbelief. From behind him,
a voice called out, a voice belonging to someone he knew all too well.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Yo, Merry Christmas.
Are you here for the after-service, mister Black Santa?

name: Color Gang's Members
text:
—Bl...
Black Santa!?

Stunned by the unexpected term, the children looked at each other
before hurriedly gathering around Krampus.

name: Color Gang
text:
Um, mister Black Santa...
We're so sorry about everything!!

They surrounded him and bowed deeply. Their sheer sincerity
left Krampus even more flustered than before.

name: Color Gang
text:
We really were idiots. We were causing trouble everywhere,
and then we did that just because we were scared of being punished...

name: Color Gang
text:
Oh, and we're going to apologize
to the Santa School too, of course!

name: Krampus
text:
—I-I see.
So, this current situation is... Uh...!?

name: Baphomet
text:
Please allow me to apologize as well, Black Santa-sama.
This incident was a result of my lack of supervision as their guardian.

name: Baphomet
text:
I should have taken action immediately, but I selfishly asked
for more time to accommodate our own convenience...

name: Jagannath
text:
Well, the result is that they were able to reflect
on their actions themselves, rather than being forced to.

name: Jagannath
text:
If you can, please forgive them, Krampus.
Besides, I'm technically an accomplice in all this too!

name: Krampus
text:
What!? No— I mean...
Hold on, I can't keep up with this!!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Haha. And for the record, I'm an accomplice too.
Feel free to punish me all you want?

Jack spoke with a 'mischievous', joyful tone.
Krampus stared intently at his smug expression.

name: Krampus
text:
Does this mean... You turned 'black into white'...!?
In such a short time, and right before Christmas?

name: Krampus
text:
So you... found a new path,
a new possibility for the Santa Claus!?

At those words, the children froze,
their gazes slowly sliding toward Jack's face.

name: Color Gang
text:
—Heeh!?
Jack... You're a Santa!?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Oh, right. Did I forget to tell you?
Yeah, I'm a genuine Santa.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Well, just like your favorite cop Jagannath over there.
I'm a bit of a 'bad boy' Santa Claus, though?

name: Color Gang
text:
But... You still took our side?
...Ugh, Jack...

name: Color Gang's Members
text:
Thank you so much!
We really, really love you, Jack——!!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Whoa! H-Hey! Don't all hug me at once!
If you hug someone like me, you'll catch a cold!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes, yes, they're definitely good children.
Even in my eyes, all of you are well-behaved children right now!

name: Krampus
text:
—Whoa!?
Since when did you get here, Snegurochka!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ehe, Big Brother called me.
My 'Santa Stealth' is pretty amazing, wouldn't you agree, Krampus-san?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Besides, today is Christmas Eve.
It's the day my power is at its peak!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Merry Christmas, [Player]-san.
It seems you've been taking care of Big Brother again?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hey, I was the one
taking care of things this time!?

name: Color Gang
text:
Eh... Snegurochka?
Is it really the real Snegurochka?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Oh, so some of you do know about me. Well then, I'll show
you a little transformation as a special service— Hiyah!

name: Snegurochka
text:
And— Naturally,
good children deserve presents!!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'll show you the special power I inherited from my Grandpa.
Ready? Kirakira-Pappa! Pi-ra-po-re-pa!!

With a wave of Snegurochka's magic wand, a mountain of presents
appeared amid a flurry of glittering snowflakes.

name: Color Gang
text:
Uwaaaa! S-So cool...
Thank you, Snegurochka!!

name: Color Gang
text:
...Is it really okay for someone like me to get this,
after all the bad things I've done...?

name: Jack Frost
text:
A Santa grants the wishes of 'good children'.
Since you've reflected on your actions, you've earned that right.

name: Jack Frost
text:
You're going to make up for what you did from now on, right?
Just think of this as a bit of encouragement from Santa.

Watching this heartwarming scene from a distance
was the Asakusa group, who happened to be passing by.

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Whoa, a Santa's power really is something else.
That was pure magic just now, wasn't it?

name: Motosumi
text:
I wonder if our usual reindeer will visit us again this year.
Heheh, those kids will be so happy...

name: Snegurochka
text:
—Ah! You there, good boy!
I have to give you a present too~

name: Licho
text:
Eh, she's looking this way?
N-No way...!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Here you go! Sanat Kumara-kun.
Make sure you stay an extra good boy next year too!

name: Asakusa Group
text: <p2 style="font-size: 140%">——As expected!!?</p2>

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—Hm?
What is there to 'expect' about?

name: Color Gang
text:
...Wow. To think the first proper Christmas of my life
would turn into such an amazing day.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh! You guys are still kids,
getting excited over presents, aren't ya?

name: Jagannath
text:
But well, I guess a Christmas
present really is that special...

Looking up at Jagannath, who had a briefly vulnerable expression,
the children giggled and swayed their shoulders with joy.

Jagannath furrowed his brows in confusion, and then
someone's voice erupted, unable to contain it any longer.

name: Color Gang
text:
You know, we actually 'have' something for you too.
A Christmas present for you, Jagannath!!

name: Jagannath
text: —Oooh?

And so, the final program to conclude the multi-day
Fighting Festival— The 'Float Parade', finally began.

The Deco-Floats advanced down the path lined with countless spectators.
Leading the way was a particularly dazzling Christmas float—

name: Y'golonac
text:
From the Kabukicho Outlaws, 'Kichorabu's' Champagne Tower
and Butterflies of the Night Deco-Float~!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uncle's even got the King and the Queen riding along.
But Uncle, who's leading them, is the true ruler of tonight~!

name: Tsukuyomi
text:
The view from here is quite beautiful. Suzuka's group's
custom bikes leading the way are also quite flashy, aren't they?

name: Ellie
text:
Um, the sub-team led by the vice-captain has a name too, right?
What was it... I think it was—

name: Suzuka
text:
Let's go, everyone!
Kabukicho Sub-Team— 'Yachoutai'!!

name: Yaksha
text: —Roger!

name: Ibaraki
text:
Hehehe, riding without being stopped by the cops feels great.
It's official and all, right, brother Shuten?

name: Shuten
text:
Yea, riding these iron horses' also quite fine, Ibaraki.
But, you sure it's alright for us to be tagging with these Kabukicho ladies?

name: Ibaraki
text:
You're part of a Shinjuku faction, so it's all fine!
Besides, I wanted to ride with you on Christmas—

name: Ibaraki
text:
I mean, even uncle Gyobu's tanuki 'followers' are
running around everywhere, so anything's fine!!

name: Gyobu
text:
The Tag Match forbade 'Sacred Artifacts',
so surely it won't hurt to let them enjoy themselves freely for the finale.

name: Tetsuox
text:
Heheh, this liveliness' just the best!
We're going to pull this float with everything we've got!!

name: Tetsuya
text:
Well, I don't mind putting some muscle
into this kind of background work. Right, Kengo?

name: Kengo
text:
Wait, why was I even roped into this!?
Well, I'm having fun, so whatever!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hihihi! Kabukicho is definitely number one!
Uncle's place is in the glittering Kabukicho that shines at night~!!

Sighs of admiration for the alluring beauty were heard everywhere.
The second wave, as if to drown out those sighs, arrived with a roar—

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Forward, our 'Asokenkai'! Carrying our feelings for Asakusa
and all those who dwell within it!!

name: Motosumi
text:
Heheh, feast your eyes on our full-throttle yankee Deco-Float!!
...Wait, was it really okay for us to ride along, General Manager?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Of course. The more people who know the view from the heights, the better.
Besides, this is to reward you for your hard work in the program!

name: Qinglong
text:
Good heavens, I am grateful for the ride since my back is out.
However, this intense swaying is shaking my lower back quite a bit...!?

name: Tianzun
text:
How pathetic, Master Qinglong. Why don't you take up dancing
like I do to keep your waist limber?

name: Amanojaku
text:
Geez, stop trying to lead
him in that direction, Tianzun-sensei!

name: Hotei
text:
Hey, hey, wouldn't you look at this? Our custom bike army is
glittering and full of energy. Quite a sight, isn't it~!?

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Kakaka! Onwards!
Asakusa Sub-Team— 'Hyakkiyaku'!!

百鬼夜駆 (hyakkiyakku / hundred-demon-night-parade):
might also be a wordplay on 早く (hayaku / hurry up, quickly, etc.)

name: Ogre
text: Osssssssssssu!!!!

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Tonight, I'm no longer the Vice-Head, but the Head itself―
Let the monsters and demons blast through this Christmas Eve!

name: Nezha
text:
Heheh, this Nezha-chan's all up for a wild ride!
Hold on tight to my shoulders, Hanuman-senpai!

name: Hanuman
text:
Zig-zagging really is fun!
Pararira-pararira! Pararira-pararira!

name: Licho
text:
What the hell? They're playing
Christmas songs with their bike engines!?

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Haha, 'motorcycle gangs' and Christmas are quite a mismatch, aren't they?
—Hey, you guys in the back! Put some more muscle into pulling!!

name: Ganglie
text:
Oink! I only came here to pick up girls,
so why was I roped into this!?

name: Sanzo
text:
I only followed Ganglie here!?
Besides, isn't this float carrying way too many people!?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Fuh, this is the Asakusa I love and those who follow their own path...
I shall lead you. And— I shall learn from you as well!

Since it was the local Shoraionji, enthusiastic applause erupted.
The third float, not to be outdone, made its presence known.

name: Taishakuten
text:
Alright! Shifting like a bolt of lightning!
The Shibamata group, 'Teijashu', has arrived!!

name: Nobuharu
text:
And, the Shibamata Sub-Team!
—'Senkyaku Banrai'!!

okay so maybe these aren't too bad
千客万雷 (senhyaku banrai / thousand-guest-ten thousand-thunder):
no wordplay here, but probably something like Storm of a Thousand Guests

name: Nobuharu
text:
Since almost everyone is helping pull our float,
we've had Ryota-senpai and Shiro-senpai join the sub-team!

name: Nobuharu
text:
And, since we don't
have bikes, nor licenses—

name: Nobuharu
text: <p2 style="font-size: 140%">——We came by bicycles!!</p2>

name: Ryota
text:
Ehehe, these flashy custom bicycles
are cooler than I thought!

name: Shiro
text:
I can't believe I ended up riding such a gaudy bicycle.
If I'm going to participate, I'd rather be on the team pulling the float—

name: Zao
text: <p2 style="font-size: 135%">——Mountains!!!</p2>

name: Ryota
text:
Whoa, he came out of
nowhere at the very end!?

name: Shiro
text:
Well, I had a feeling this might happen!
Floats are written as 'Mountain-Car', after all,
and they're also called 'Floating Mountains'!

wooo kanji
山車 (dashi / float), also called 曳山 (hikiyama / floating mountain)
both of them contain 山 (yama / mountain)

hopefully this will also explain the joke 2 sentences later

name: Shiro
text:
But still, you sure took
your time arriving, Zao-senpai?

name: Zao
text:
Yeah, my extra classes are finally finished!
Tonight, I'm going to pull this mountain! Uoooooohhhh——!!

name: Barong
text:
Heheh, this feeling of everyone pulling together in a steady rhythm is fun!
Wasshoi! Wasshoi! See? You're getting into it, right?

name: Hei Long Yi Quan
text:
How do I look carrying the Deco-Float? Cute, right~?
I'll work hard, so make sure to give me lots of support in the comments!

name: Hei Long Yi Quan
text:
...Wait! That Master who just commented about how cool the
handsome bird next to me is— Take a good look at me instead!?

name: Thunderbird
text:
Ahaha, don't look at me like that, baby.
But, I'm glad to know I've caught the eyes of your Masters.

name: Taishakuten
text:
Hahaha! Shibamata owes a debt of gratitude to our fun helpers.
Every one of you was incredibly reliable!!

Following them was the fourth float, emitting a mysterious, soft glow.
Illuminated by that gentle and calm light were—

name: Baphomet
text:
Oh my, whatever shall I do? To think I would be so
shamelessly put on a 'pedestal' in the most literal sense...

name: Baphomet
text:
But— This sense of happiness might be a first for me.
After all, this is a gift from those children.

name: Kirito
text:
This wish only comes true once you're up there, Baphomet-san.
Don't overthink it. Just showing them your smile is the right way to go.

name: Color Gang
text:
Alright, let's pull with everything we've got!
Let's give Baphomet and the others the best view as a thank you!!

name: Color Gang
text:
—Wait, is it okay for you to be helping
us instead of the Asakusa team, Jinn-sensei?

name: Jinn
text:
Yeah, they have plenty of people and power over there.
I want to see your wish through to the end!

name: Jinn
text:
Besides, even Triton-sensei volunteered.
That guy's actually got a soft side despite how he looks, doesn't he?

name: Triton
text:
T-That's— Once you've gotten this involved, you're bound
to feel some sympathy for them, aren't you!?

name: Jinn
text:
Heheh, I remember that you said something about admiring
a teacher with such passionate love like me, didn't you?

name: Triton
text:
Haah? I never said anything about admiration! If anything,
weren't you the one saying that someone exemplary like me is your ideal!?

name: Jinn
text:
M-My ideal!? Now you're just being full of yourself!?
I only said there were a few things I should learn from you—!!

name: Baphomet
text:
Fufufu, the 'devil' dwelling in both their hearts is one and the same.
That is why they are so strongly attracted to each other.

name: Baphomet
text:
...By the way, Kirito-sama, what about us?
There is nothing strongly binding us together. And yet—

name: Kirito
text:
...It's about time I make my leave.
If we're unlucky, I'll see you again, Baphomet-san.

name: Baphomet
text:
—Yes. Please stay healthy for the coming year.
I have no other wishes but that, Kirito-sama.

And finally, the fifth float brought up the rear.
Though it wasn't part of the original plan, the ones riding it were, naturally—

name: Jagannath
text:
Ha! To think you guys'd
prepare something like this in secret!

name: Jagannath
text:
And this awesome design—
You're way too cool for this, dammit!!

The bold design was split down the center. The left half was motifed after a cop,
and the right half after a professional fighter.

With a background where a championship belt and a police badge were joined,
the delinquent cop duo was repeatedly bathed in the light of red patrol lamps.

options.text: This really is the best gift.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, there's not a single other float as cool as this one.
I'd love to ride this into the ring for my next match!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, there's not a single other float as cool as this one.
I'd love to ride this into the ring for my next match!

options.text: Was it a good idea to ride along...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
