Hey now, it wouldn't be complete without you.
For them, and for me too!

text:
Jagannath laughed with pure joy in his voice before
turning his gaze toward the path ahead.

name: Jagannath
text:
Still, the 'police are actually participating' in this, aren't they?
This has got to be a first for the Fighting Festival.

Leading the way were police motorcycles.
And pulling the float, were none other than the Tenjins.

name: Toji
text:
Leading and security— Maintaining order is our duty.
Especially when it comes to a police-related float.

name: Toji
text:
...For tonight, I'll let you have [Player]. It's frustrating,
but you've earned it after what you accomplished.

name: Oguchi Magami
text:
Hah, hah! Walking with everyone is the best!
Awooo! Festivals are the best——!!

name: Tajikarao
text:
Wahaha! Festivals really are delightful!
But, maybe I wanted to be on the side pulling the float with the Tenjins too?

name: Police Academy Student
text:
Wasshoi! Wasshoi!
Wasshoi! Wasshoi!!

name: Toji
text:
—Hm? If I'm not mistaken, have the Tenjins
on Jagannath's side multiplied significantly?

name: Jagannath
text:
Alright, let's hit that 'drift' with everything we've got!
Back home at the Rath Yātrā, that's the main thing going for it!!

Rath Yātrā / Chariot Festival: major Hindu festival with a chariot procession
where Jagannath, Balabhadra and Subhadra are erected on chariots move from a temple to another
I don't exactly know where the 'drifting' part came,
but I found that the number of people crushed by the chariots' wheels was certainly not 0

name: Jagannath
text:
Pulling a massive float and pushing it to the limit—
That kind of frenzy is the true spirit of a festival!!

Jagannath's roar was swallowed by the night sky as
Santa's sleighs passed overhead one after another.

Among them were Jack and Snegurochka,
who were just about to depart.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Wow, it's even more beautiful from up here.
Thinking of it as a light that you protected makes it even more beautiful, Big Brother...

name: Jack Frost
text:
I wasn't the one protecting it. It's a special light that
everyone at the festival protected together.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ehehe, then I can give the festival-goers
a present of snow magic, right? —Hiyah!

The glittering trail of the sleigh turned into snow,
as various shapes of crystals fluttered down toward the ground.

name: Jagannath
text:
Oh? It's snowing...
So this is what they call a White Christmas?

options.text: This feels like a gift too.
(Look up at the trail in the sky)

name: Jagannath
text:
Haha. So this is Jack and the others' gift.
...Everyone's got such a stylish way of doing things.

name: Jagannath
text:
But everyone involved in the Fighting Festival is 'like that'.
That's exactly why I love this festival.

Snowflakes quickly clung to his thick black fur.
The light layer of snow gave him a soft, almost adorable appearance.

options.text: (Laugh and say he's turning into a white tiger)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hm? Oh, snow's turning my black fur white. How about it?
Don't I look pretty cool as a white tiger too?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...W-What's with you staring at me so suddenly? Oh, the snow?
Having you staring at me like that is a bit embarrassing...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa, hey! Don't startle me!
Don't just suddenly touch me when I'm off guard like that!

name: Jagannath
text:
...But, you know. I guess being with you lets me see things
I never would have noticed otherwise.

He looked up at the sky with a boyish, honest voice.
All the while, the snow continued to dye him white.

Standing close enough that their shoulders touched,
they were mesmerized by the view— Until their eyes met once more.

name: Jagannath
text:
—Hm? Am I cold? Not at all.
In fact... I'm feeling quite warm.

name: Jagannath
text:
Amid the heat of the festival, I'm riding on a gift from those brats.
And on top of that— I've got you right here by my side.

He looked away and scratched his cheek bashfully.
Then, with his usual, pure smile of a delinquent boy—

name: Jagannath
text:
...Heheh. This is the best
Christmas present of my life!!

The colorful illuminations and snowflakes created a halo of light.
Glittering particles danced in the air like magic.

The twinkles in the night sky, the sparkles on the ground—
The eyes of the people reflecting it all shone just as brightly.

A warm fire was lit in every heart, and everyone shared it naturally.
In the white of winter, a special season where everyone can gently share their warmth—

Christmas Street Fight
～Ruthless Winter Festival Struggle!～
Continue to Epilogue—
